name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Arrow Pack
summary: Inspired by the popular TV series, this pack is set after the shipwreck that leaves Oliver trapped on a treacherous island with Slade Wilson. Experience Oliver’s survival training as they work their way through the jungle to a mercenary camp. In addition to Oliver and Slade, play as fan favorite characters Diggle, Felicity Smoak, Helena Bertinelli, Malcolm Merlyn, Roy Harper and Sarah Lance.
